00026 #include "lpc17xx_adc.h"
00027 #include "lpc17xx_libcfg.h"
00028 #include "lpc17xx_pinsel.h"
00029 #include "debug_frmwrk.h"

00031 /* Example group ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00037 /************************** PRIVATE DEFINITIONS ***********************/
00038 #define _ADC_INT                        ADC_ADINTEN2
00039 #define _ADC_CHANNEL            ADC_CHANNEL_2
00040 
00041 /************************** PRIVATE VARIABLES *************************/
00042 uint8_t menu1[] =
00043 "********************************************************************************\n\r"
00044 "Hello NXP Semiconductors \n\r"
00045 " ADC demo \n\r"
00046 "\t - MCU: LPC17xx \n\r"
00047 "\t - Core: ARM CORTEX-M3 \n\r"
00048 "\t - Communicate via: UART0 - 115200 bps \n\r"
00049 " Use ADC with 12-bit resolution rate of 200KHz, read in hardware-triggred mode\n\r"
00050 " Press INT0 button to start ADC conversion, ADC interrupt when conversion completed\n\r"
00051 " ADC channel value is read back and displayed via UART0\n\r"
00052 " Turn the potentiometer to see how ADC value changes\n\r"
00053 "********************************************************************************\n\r";
00054 
00055 uint32_t adc_value;
00056 
00057 /************************** PRIVATE FUNCTION *************************/
00058 void ADC_IRQHandler(void);
00059 
00060 void print_menu(void);
00061 
00062 /*----------------- INTERRUPT SERVICE ROUTINES --------------------------*/
00063 /*********************************************************************/
00068 void ADC_IRQHandler(void)
00069 {
00070         adc_value = 0;
00071         if (ADC_ChannelGetStatus(LPC_ADC,ADC_CHANNEL_2,ADC_DATA_DONE))
00072         {
00073                 adc_value =  ADC_ChannelGetData(LPC_ADC,ADC_CHANNEL_2);
00074                 NVIC_DisableIRQ(ADC_IRQn);
00075         }
00076 }
00077 
00078 /*-------------------------PRIVATE FUNCTIONS------------------------------*/
00079 /*********************************************************************/
00084 void print_menu(void)
00085 {
00086         _DBG(menu1);
00087 }
00088 
00089 
00090 /*-------------------------MAIN FUNCTION------------------------------*/
00091 /*********************************************************************/
00096 int c_entry(void)
00097 {
00098         PINSEL_CFG_Type PinCfg;
00099 
00100         /* Initialize debug via UART0
00101          * – 115200bps
00102          * – 8 data bit
00103          * – No parity
00104          * – 1 stop bit
00105          * – No flow control
00106          */
00107         debug_frmwrk_init();
00108 
00109         // print welcome screen
00110         print_menu();
00111 
00112         /*
00113          * Init ADC pin connect
00114          * AD0.2 on P0.25
00115          */
00116         PinCfg.Funcnum = 1;
00117         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00118         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00119         PinCfg.Pinnum = 25;
00120         PinCfg.Portnum = 0;
00121         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00122 
00123         /*
00124          * Init P2.10
00125          *
00126          */
00127         PinCfg.Funcnum = 1; //EINT0
00128         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00129         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00130         PinCfg.Pinnum = 10;
00131         PinCfg.Portnum = 2;
00132         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00133 
00134         /* Configuration for ADC:
00135          *  select: ADC channel 2 (if using MCB1700 board)
00136          *              ADC channel 5 (if using IAR-LPC1768 board)
00137          *  ADC conversion rate = 200KHz
00138          */
00139         ADC_Init(LPC_ADC, 200000);
00140         ADC_IntConfig(LPC_ADC,_ADC_INT,ENABLE);
00141         ADC_ChannelCmd(LPC_ADC,_ADC_CHANNEL,ENABLE);
00142         ADC_EdgeStartConfig(LPC_ADC,ADC_START_ON_FALLING);
00143 
00144         /* preemption = 1, sub-priority = 1 */
00145         NVIC_SetPriority(ADC_IRQn, ((0x01<<3)|0x01));
00146 
00147         while(1)
00148         {
00149                 adc_value = 0;
00150 
00151                 // Start conversion on EINT0 falling edge
00152                 ADC_StartCmd(LPC_ADC,ADC_START_ON_EINT0);
00153 
00154                 /* Enable ADC in NVIC */
00155                 NVIC_EnableIRQ(ADC_IRQn);
00156 
00157                 _DBG("Press INT0 button to start ADC conversion on AD0.2...");_DBG_("");
00158                 while(adc_value==0);
00159 
00160                 //Display the result of conversion on the UART0
00161                 _DBG("ADC value on channel 2: ");
00162 
00163                 _DBD32(adc_value);
00164                 _DBG_("");
00165         }
00166         ADC_DeInit(LPC_ADC);
00167         return (0);
00168 }
00169 
00170 /* Support required entry point for other toolchain */
00171 int main (void)
00172 {
00173         return c_entry();
00174 }
